reference.title: apiParam
reference.shortdesc: The <apiParam> element provides the definitions for the values that can be passed to parameters.

refbody.section:
Description
The <apiParam> element provides and contains all the elements necessary for the basic structure of a method, constructor, property, and formal parameters. In the <apiParam> element, the <state>, <keyword>, and <ph> elements are provided to support unexpected contingencies within the value to return.
